title: famososMuertos
author: famososMuertos
content: Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynastyhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Winning_Time:_The_Rise_of_the_Lakers_DynastyFirst of all clarify that I am more of the time of the 90s with Michael Jordan Without a doubt, no matter what your favorite sport is, you know who Magic Johnson is, the Dream Team helped in those years and went viral in the world (Barcelona 1992) and in a certain way it was there that many of us discovered Magic Johnson.After watching the series, I have undoubtedly watched that game 5 and 6 of the 1980 NBA final series.It is surprising how things have changed after so many years and how the sponsorships of the players were in their infancy and how Magic ]Johnson rejected the business of his life by saying NO to Nike, among countless other situations that obviously move between reality and the fiction.As a Laker fan this is a series to watch.
